greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Distance between pairs of primes differing by 4.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: with(numtheory): pre:=0: for n from 1 to 3000 do if isprime(n) and isprime(n+4) then if pre<>0 then printf("%d, ",n-pre) fi: pre:=n fi od: # C. Ronaldo
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Mar 06 2000
